trigger: Zone temperature falls below a threshold
trigger_description: This trigger fires every time the zone temperature drops below a threshold. Only zones which display a measured temperature on the app can be selected.
This trigger fires every time occupancy is detected in a zone. Only zones with a Room Sensor assigned can be selected.

trigger: An assigned device has a low battery
trigger_description: This trigger fires every time an assigned device on your system gets a low battery.
This trigger fires every time the zone temperature exceeds a threshold. Only zones which display a measured temperature on the app can be selected.
The Trigger fires every time the zone heating turns on.
